QuestData.Title: That Pounding Sound
QuestData.Description: Commander. The rangari and I were just discussing the merits of various 'hunting' approaches.$B$BI assured her that the SI:7 are well-equipped to deal with any situation, even ones out in the wild.$B$BShe seems to think that we don't know what we're doing when it comes to bringing down game in 'her land.'$B$BWe're not going to let her get away with saying that, right? Let's take down some clefthoof.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Pairs of Leatherhide Ears from Leatherhide clefthoof.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's unbelievable how arrogant these rangari can be.
QuestData.RewardText: Twelve pairs, huh? That's pretty good, commander.$B$BUm, no, I think that's about how many I managed to bag. Yeah... about a dozen pairs of ears. Yep....
